title: BRIEF-Imperial Logistics Says M&G Investment's Total Beneficial Interest In Co Is 10.52%
text:
BRIEF-Imperial Logistics Says M&G Investment's Total Beneficial Interest In Co Is 10.52%

Stock Markets 36 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 15:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Imperial Logistics Says M&G Investment's Total Beneficial Interest In Co Is 10.52% Oct 24 (Reuters) - Imperial Logistics Ltd : * DISCLOSURE OF BENEFICIAL HOLDING IN IMPERIAL ORDINARY SHARES * M&G INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT, ON BEHALF OF ITS UNDERLYING CLIENTS, ACQUIRED BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN SECURITIES OF IMPERIAL LOGISTICS * M&G INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT'S TOTAL BENEFICIAL INTEREST HELD IN ORDINARY SHARES IS CURRENTLY 10.52 PERCENT

BRIEF-Imperial Logistics Says M&G Investment's Total Beneficial Interest In Co Is 10.52%
